scripts.deploy: node -e "const path = require('path').resolve('.'); console.log('PROJECT_FILES_PATH:', path);" && (set PROJECT_FILES_PATH=%cd% || export PROJECT_FILES_PATH=$(pwd)) && npm run start-cluster
scripts.start-cluster: kind delete cluster --name maincluster && kind create cluster --name maincluster --config kind-config.yaml && kind load docker-image versiontwo:local --name maincluster && kind load docker-image orders:local --name maincluster && kubectl apply -f ./kubernetes --recursive
scripts.apply-orders: docker-compose build orders && kubectl delete deployments orders && kind load docker-image orders:local --name maincluster && kubectl apply -f ./kubernetes --recursive
